verses.name: Deuteronomy 5:25
verses.text: Now therefore why should we die? for this great fire will consume us: if we hear the voice of the Lord our God any more, then we shall die.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 5:26
verses.text: For who is there of all flesh, that hath heard the voice of the living God speaking out of the midst of the fire, as we have, and lived?

verses.name: Deuteronomy 5:27
verses.text: Go thou near, and hear all that the Lord our God shall say: and speak thou unto us all that the Lord our God shall speak unto thee; and we will hear it, and do it.
